Posts.EditableText: Hey I wanted to release a standalone version of my game. How do I do this?
Posts.HTML: Hey I wanted to release a standalone version of my game. How do I do this?

Posts.EditableText: There's a compiler (I forget where - Github?) but the feedback seems to be that it produces errors often. I think this is being resolved by Alex creating a new version of Quest (Questkit) that will write as javascript. But I wouldn't expect that anytime soon.
Posts.HTML: There's a compiler (I forget where - Github?) but the feedback seems to be that it produces errors often. I think this is being resolved by Alex creating a new version of Quest (Questkit) that will write as javascript. But I wouldn't expect that anytime soon.

Posts.EditableText: Um, there's an online one here: http://questjs.azurewebsites.net/compile (I can't vouch for how good it is or isn't) The Github page appears to be here: https://github.com/textadventures/quest ... r/Compiler
Posts.HTML:
